summary.para: Identifies a property of a security context object. This enumeration is used with .
On the wire, a security context is identified by an absolute URI, which is unique to both sender and recipient. See WS-SecureConversation. This property is a structure that represents that URI.
If a is used as bootstrap security, this property is a that represents the username that was used during the establishment of the security context.
If a is used as bootstrap security, this property is a HANDLE that represents the token that was used during the establishment of the security context.
If a is used as bootstrap security, this property is a pointer to a WS_XML_BUFFER that represents the SAML assertion that was used during the establishment of the security context.
